confirmation_body:
Follow these steps to serve a claim:
* [Download the sealed claim form](https://hmcts-cmc-issue-prototype.herokuapp.com/public/documents/N1-form-sealed.pdf)
* Send the form, particulars of claim and [a response pack](https://formfinder.hmctsformfinder.justice.gov.uk/n9-eng.pdf) (PDF, 266 KB) to the defendant by 10 April 2020
* [Confirm service online](#) within 21 days of service
